ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor

Class GameObjectFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.actor.GameObjectFactory

  • public class GameObjectFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory to handle GameObject creation and destruction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GameObjectFactory getInstance()
        Get a new or already existing instance of this GameFactory. Follows the singleton pattern.
        Returns:
        new or already created GameObjectFactory object.

      • getObstacleCounter

        public int getObstacleCounter()
        Get the count of the currently active obstacles.
        Returns:
        int representing the number of obstacles.

      • createGameObject

        public GameObject createGameObject(GameObjectTypes type)
        Will obtain a new GameObject from one of the pools and increase the corresponding counter. If one or MAXPLAYERCOUNT player(s) already exist and another one should be created an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        type - Defines the type of GameObject to be created.
        Returns:
        The type of GameObject requested or null if the type is not yet implemented.

      • destroyObstacle

        public void destroyObstacle(Obstacle obstacle)
        Will free an Obstacle and make it available for future use in the pool. Also decrements the counter.
        Parameters:
        obstacle - The Obstacle object to destroy.

      • destroyPlayer

        public void destroyPlayer(Player player)
        Will free an Player and make it available for future use in the pool. Also decrements the counter.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player object to destroy.

      • destroyCollectable

        public void destroyCollectable(Collectable collectable)

      • destroyImmortalPowerUp

        public void destroyImmortalPowerUp(ImmortalPowerUp immortalPowerUp)

      • destroyFreezePowerDown

        public void destroyFreezePowerDown(FreezePowerDown freezePowerDown)

      • getCollectableCounter

        public int getCollectableCounter()
        Get the count of the currently active collectables.
        Returns:
        int representing the number of collectables.

      • getImmortalPowerUpCounter

        public int getImmortalPowerUpCounter()
        Get the count of the currently active ImmortalPowerUps.
        Returns:
        int representing the number of ImmortalPowerUps active.

      • getFreezePowerDownCounter

        public int getFreezePowerDownCounter()
        Get the count of the currently active FreezePowerDowns.
        Returns:
        int representing the number of FreezePowerDowns active.
